name: Forgetful John
description:
This game tells a very short story about John Doe... a very forgetful GameDev that can't use his skills more than once before forgetting it. 

It's my first game ever, and I've made it in less than a week!

Credits:

2D Game Kit - Udemy (Assets and Inspiration)

N91Music - (Base for the Background Music)

Kauzz - Assets

Mounir Tohami - Assets
